meta.content: Our District includes two middle schools and five elementary schools and serves students in kindergarten through eighth grades in the Chicago suburban towns of Tinley Park, Orland Hills, and Orland Park, Illinois.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: christa mcauliffe elementary school,elementary or middle school,fernway elementary school,grissom middle school,helen keller elementary school,john a bannes elementary school,junior high,kirby school district 140,ksd 140,millenium elementary school,orland park il,prairie view middle school,tinley park il
Welcome to Kirby School District 140, comprised of K-8 schools in the Chicago suburban towns of Tinley Park, Orland Hills, and Orland Park, Illinois.

Our District includes two middle schools and five elementary schools and serves students in kindergarten through eighth grades in the Chicago suburban towns of Tinley Park, Orland Hills, and Orland Park, Illinois.

h3.a: No eLearning on Friday, April 10 and Monday, April 13

div.p: There is no remote eLearning on Friday, April 10 and Monday, April 13. Enjoy the long weekend!

h3.a: April 2, 2020 eLearning Update - New Program Begins April 6

div.p: Our new eLearning program will begin Monday, April 6. You can find our complete eLearning Program Overview with FAQ’s at ksd140.org/eLearning

I hope this message finds you safe and well. Yesterday, Illinois Governor J.B. Pritzker extended the “stay-at home” order and announced that remote learning in Illinois will be extended through April 30.
